messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Birthday
messages.msgSnippet: HAPPY BIRTHDAY!  to your son   He picked the absolute perfect day to celebrate his birthday .  The weather was finally wonderful ( as opposed to raining and
messages.messageBody:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY! to your son He picked the absolute perfect day to
celebrate his birthday . The weather was finally wonderful ( as opposed to raining
and humid). I think from now on, I will only pick perfect days to celebrate my
birthday, it just makes so much more sense. :-)

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Birthday
messages.msgSnippet: Well, my son finally decided he was ready to turn 6.  So we had his birthday party yesterday, birthday was in March.  Had a great time.  My 9 year old was
messages.messageBody:
Well, my son finally decided he was ready to turn 6. So we had his birthday
party yesterday, birthday was in March. Had a great time. My 9 year old was
outside in the AM and said "you know mom....the air always smells better on a
special day."

So sweet.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Birthday
messages.msgSnippet: What a wonderful thing!! Janis ... From: genant2@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, June 22, 2003 10:20 AM Subject: Re:
messages.messageBody:
What a wonderful thing!!

Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: genant2@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, June 22, 2003 10:20 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Birthday


Well, my son finally decided he was ready to turn 6. So we had his birthday
party yesterday, birthday was in March. Had a great time. My 9 year old was
outside in the AM and said "you know mom....the air always smells better on a
special day."

So sweet.
Pam G.
